title: Create CodexType struct and ResolveAgentType('codex')
description: Add CodexType struct implementing AgentType interface. Register in ResolveAgentType so agent_type: codex works in role configs. Command() returns 'codex'. NewAdapter() creates CodexAdapter. RoleArgs maps model, instructions, and permission mode to Codex CLI flags (--model, --full-auto/--suggest/--ask). Unit tests.
